# Prepare R
```{r}
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(
  haven,
  tidyverse,
  lme4,
  sjPlot,
  sjmisc,
  sjlabelled,
  ggthemes,
  reshape
)

wd <- "D:/Dropbox/DataVisualization" # Flo
# wd <- "/Users/LR/Dropbox/DataVisualization/" # Lisa
setwd(wd)
```


# Load data
```{r}
price  <- read_csv("crypto-markets.csv")
google <- read_csv("Bitcoin_google_1_10_2017.csv")
news   <- read_csv("Bitcoin_news_1_10_2017.csv")
```

```{r}
price %>%
  filter(symbol == "BTC") %>%
  select(date, open, spread, market) ->
price
```


# Merge 3 datasets
```{r}
price %>%
  right_join( google, by = "date") %>% 
  right_join(news, by = "date") ->
merge
```

# Rename variables
```{r}
names(merge)[2:ncol(merge)] <- c("Preis", "Spread", "Gesamtwert", 
                                 "Google-Suchen", "Nachrichtenartikel")
```
